00019 using System;
00020 using System.IO;
00021 using System.Diagnostics;
00022 using System.Windows.Forms;
00023 
00024 namespace NyFolder {
00025     public class Startup {
00026         public static int Main (string[] args) {
00027             try {
00028                 string path = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory;
00029                 path = Path.Combine(path, "NyFolder.exe");
00030 
00031                 Process proc = new Process();
00032                 proc.EnableRaisingEvents = false;
00033                 proc.StartInfo.FileName = "mono";
00034                 proc.StartInfo.Arguments = path;
00035                 proc.Start();
00036             } catch {
00037                 MessageBox.Show("Mono Not Found!\nSet environment PATH variable for Mono.\nhttp://www.mono-project.com/", "Mono Not Found");
00038                 return(1);
00039             }
00040             return(0);
00041         }
00042     }
00043 }
